Feature.Description: This Feature provides access control for the implementing server. Therefore it specifies the SiLA Client Meta Data for the access token, that has been provided by the AuthenticationService core Feature. In order to use the servers functionality, that access token has to be sent with every call to server.

StandardExecutionError.Description: The sent access token is not valid.
The lifetime of the sent access token has expired.
The sent access token does not authorize to access the required SiLA Server functionality.

Metadata.Description: Token to be sent with every call in order to get access to the SiLA Server functionality.
